preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 30 g of Palladium (Pr) using an accurate scale. 
 2. Measure 10 g of Scandium (Sc) using the same scale. 
 3. Measure 40 g of Thallium (Tl) accurately. 
 4. Combine all three metals in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 5. Use a mechanical mixer or a mortar and pestle to ensure thorough blending of the powders.
